headlines.description: Joey Votto doubled twice, drove in two runs and scored twice, leading Tim Adleman and the Cincinnati Reds over the Pittsburgh Pirates 4-2 on Thursday.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Duvall's triple pads Reds' lead) 2017/05/04 ESHEET

headlines.shortLinkText: Votto, Adleman lead Reds over Pirates 4-2

headlines.description: Max Scherzer struck out a season-high 11 to bounce back from his worst outing this season, and the Washington Nationals defeated the Arizona Diamondbacks 4-2 on Thursday.

video.headline: Scherzer quiets former team with 11 strikeouts

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Scherzer quiets former team with 11 strikeouts) 2017/05/04 ESHEET

headlines.shortLinkText: Scherzer fans 11 as Nationals beat Diamondbacks 4-2

headlines.description: Jharel Cotton struck out nine in six innings and Ryon Healy hit his fourth home run of the season to lift the Oakland Athletics over the Minnesota Twins 8-5 on Thursday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cotton, A's stop slide with 8-5 win over Twins

headlines.description: Joey Gallo homered and drove in three runs, Rougned Odor and Elvis Andrus also homered and the Texas Rangers stopped a season-worst four-game skid, beating the Houston Astros 10-4 on Thursday.

video.headline: Odor opens scoring with solo shot

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Odor opens scoring with solo shot) 2017/05/04 ESHEET

headlines.shortLinkText: Gallo, Odor, Andrus HR, Texas tops Astros 10-4 to end skid

headlines.description: Derek Holland scattered three hits while pitching into the seventh inning, Jose Abreu and Matt Davidson went deep off Ian Kennedy and the Chicago White Sox beat the Kansas City Royals 8-3 Thursda

video.headline: Abreu homers in second straight game

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Abreu homers in second straight game) 2017/05/04 ESHEET

headlines.shortLinkText: Holland's strong start helps White Sox trounce Royals 8-3

headlines.description: Albert Almora Jr. doubled leading off the 13th inning and scored on a throwing error by shortstop Freddy Galvis, giving the Chicago Cubs a 5-4 win over the Philadelphia Phillies on Thursday.

video.headline: Cubs walk off after errant throw

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Cubs walk off after errant throw) 2017/05/04 ESHEET

headlines.shortLinkText: Galvis' error gives Cubs 5-4 win over Phillies in 13 innings

headlines.description: The New York Mets have handled the three right-handed pitchers they've faced from the Atlanta Braves in this series. On Thursday, they will see if they can do the same against a lefty.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mets' sizzling offense prepares for Atlanta lefty

headlines.description: The Los Angeles Angels are expected to dip down to the minors for Thursday night's starter in the rubber match of the three-game series against the Seattle Mariners at Safeco Field.
headlines.shortLinkText: Angels rookie Meyer to take ball vs. Mariners
